item.title: Updated Carbon Law Reveals: Emissions Must Drop 12% Per Year

item.title: One Of Europe’s Top Tech Investors Is Heading To Silicon Valley
item.description: John Doran, who led TCV's European investments, has relocated to the Bay Area to bolster the $22 billion growth equity fund’s team.

item.title: Anthropic Is Letting Social Workers From Hundreds Of Government Agencies Use Its AI For Paperwork
item.description: The AI juggernaut is working with Founders Fund-backed startup Binti in its first foray into government social work.
